content.rendered:
As much as I enjoy writing, without you, it’s just me. And without your comments, I don’t know whether or not anyone is actually reading what I write.

In my last website, I had a lot of comments. And I had a lot of visitors. But I never knew if the visitors were actual people or just computer programs sent out to try to hack my website. And, with nearly all of the comments, there were links to porn. The rest of the links were to gambling.

What I want is real visits and comments by real people. That, I hope, is where you come in. I want, not to do this all by myself, but together with you. Maybe you can comment. Maybe you just let me know that you read what I wrote. Maybe you can drop me a note at LLGT Cafe, PO Box 2, Fayetteville, AR 72702. I would love to hear from you. And, if you write, I will do my best to write back.

You can also find me on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100086842894531

Now, July is National Hot Dog Month and there is still time left to celebrate. What does it take? It takes at least a hotdog and a hotdog bun, but that’s just the beginning. Here are a few things that you may want to add to your hotdog:

  • Pickle Relish
  • Mustard
  • Ketchup
  • Mayonnaise
  • Ranch Dressing
  • Horseradish Sauce
  • Salsa
  • Chili, for a chili dog
  • Cheese, shredded or melted
  • BBQ Sauce

What ideas can you come up with? How do you cook your hot dog? Do you microwave it or grill it? I would like my hot dog with a baseball game and soda, please. Comment your ideas below and have a great National Hot Dog Month.
